entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Caribou
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle. High 10 except 6 along the Strait.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of drizzle this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 10 except 6 along the Strait. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of drizzle in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming northeast 20 in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 04 May 2016
